issue.title: Problems stopping all processes associated with ignition

content.raw:
@{5be108d7216ccf49622e6b67} We will look into this. In the meantime, can you use the `competition.ign` instead of `virtual_stix.ign` ?

`ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X3 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName3:=X1 robotConfig3:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_4`
content.html:
@Sarah Kitchen We will look into this. In the meantime, can you use the competition.ign instead of virtual_stix.ign ?

ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X3 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName2:=X2 robotConfig2:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 robotName3:=X1 robotConfig3:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_4
